column2: Aggrieved  by  the  above  two documents  'P24'  and  'P26a',  the  Petitioners filed

column1: this application seeking inter alia the following relief:

column2: A Writ of Certiorari to quash the decision  reflected in  'P26a';

A  Writ  of  Certiorari  to  quash 
the  resolution  marked 
'P24'  and/or  any

other  decision 
taken  by 
the  1st  Respondent 
to  discontinue 
the  2nd
A  Writ  of  Prohibition  preventing  the  Respondents  from  discontinuing  or
reducing the efficacy of any  of the courses offered  by the  2nd  Respondent
as well as  discontinuing the 2nd  Respondent.
